title: Microsoft Co-founder Bill Gates: 'Certainly bullish on India's future...'
text: New Delhi: On whether he is bullish or bearish on India's future, Microsoft Co-founder Bill Gates says, "I'm certainly bullish. The rate of improvement in a lot of the key areas is very strong. Everyone knows that in vaccines, India is the world's leader. So we're investing with our partners here to come up with lots of new vaccines...". Speaking on his relationship with Berkshire Hathaway CEO Warren Buffett, Microsoft Co-founder Bill Gates on February 29 revealed that the two billionaires often talked about the growing Indian economy and termed the growth of Indian economy as “positive”. In an exclusive interview with ANI Editor Smita Prakash, he said, “I’ve been friends with Warren for a long time, over 30 years, and we really never had much overlap in our businesses.
